Zack Fair is a Final Fantasy character that made his first official appearance in Final Fantasy VII and first Kingdom Hearts appearance in Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep. He returns in Kingdom Hearts 3: The Return of the Chasers as Iblis' (Chernabog's) current apprentice.

Zack appears in Olympus Coliseum. Zack has been seen fighting against Terra under Hades's control, used as a Dimension Link, and talking with Ven and later fighting the Unversed alongside him and Hercules. Later, he was seen asking Aqua out on a date. Aqua shakes her head and arms in embarrassment.

In the ending credits, Zack is seen leaning against the door to Olympus Coliseum while watching Phil train Hercules. A black feather flutters behind Zack, and he looks around in surprise. All that is then seen of him is a single feather drifting down where he once stood.

The feather was from Sephiroth who took Zack to his master Iblis. Iblis offered to train Zack in how to be a great warrior, and promised him that with his help he could one day be a great hero. Zack accepted and was trained by Iblis and Sephiroth and eventually his original heroic mentality was diluted and he became dark like them, and did many terrible things in service of his master.
These Are Non-Disney Characters.
Himawari Nohara is the youngest sister of Shinnozuke Nohara and a character in the Kingdom Hearts games.

The youngest child of the Nohara family, born in 1996. A precocious and vibrant infant. While technically newborn, her character has matured and grown more intelligent during her stay in the series. She possess a palpable lust for shiny objects (jewels and precious metals) and brand-name goods, being able to discern a real jewel from a simple piece of imitation (and throwing away the latter). She emulates her mother in her utterly stubborn pursuit of handsome young men who catch her eye, not unlike her brother, who soon discovered that a way to pacify her was to put on a cutout mask of a known handsome actor. In her family, she is an icon of adoration and annoyance, causing trouble she cannot be blamed for given her infantile innocence. She can be extremely fast crawling, tiring out even Shin-chan, and often uses Shiro as a toy. Her name, which is Japanese for "sunflower", was chosen by the show's viewership and not the creator.
The Worlds who is Based off The Disney Anime, Star Wars/Star Tours, Non-Disney, and More.
Genesis Rhapsodos, known as the Crimson Soldier, is one of Sephiroth's "Friends" and a High Ranked individual in the Dark Empire.

sections.title: Based off Crisis Core: FF7 - Copied from the Final Fantasy Wiki

content.text: Genesis's physical appearance is based on Gackt, who is one of the most famous Japanese Pop/Rock idols. Gackt also wrote and performed Dirge of Cerberus's theme song, "Redemption" and actually wears the Genesis costume in the music video, though his hairstyle has changed.  Beyond this, Genesis's design bears similarities to Sephiroth, including the long coat, black clothing underneath, black boots, shoulder guards, and a large sword. Genesis is right-handed and bears a large wing on his left side, in contrast to Sephiroth, who is left-handed and has a wing on his right side. While Sephiroth's uniform and design are predominantly black and white, Genesis's is red and black. Gackt had a small amount of input on the costume design, mostly to ensure it would allow for easy movement, but also to help settle on the color scheme, which had previously been intended to be either white or black.

In the Game: Crisis Core's beginning portrays Genesis as a deserter, arrogant and childish. He even plays a trick on Zack after they meet in Banora. At first, he seems to be a simple character, but as the story progresses, the conflict within Genesis becomes increasingly visible.

Genesis was adopted, causing him to feel betrayed by both his true and false parents, one of the reasons for his departure from SOLDIER. His main source of turmoil comes from the secrets of his birth he discovers after the injury he sustains during training, that leads him to resent Shinra and all those associated with it. His seiyuu, Gackt, says that his narcissistic and destructive personality make Genesis an interesting character and makes him authentic.

In Darkness and Light, his destructive and narcissistic personality remain but more from revenge against the Realm of Light for attempting a Darkness experimented Project on them to create Darkness combating Supersoldiers, Genesis and his "friends" have revealed that they are a genetic mutation of Black Blood. Due to being a mutation, they don't have the Black Blood themselves however their attributes are greatly advanced compared to other Denizens of Darkness whom lack Black Blood, allowing Genesis to be very destructive indeed.

Genesis' History is similar to Sephiroth's, he was adopted from a young age and was revealed to have been the offspring of Project G which was one of two projects to create Darkness fighting Supersoldiers by mutating Black Blood with the Element of Light, this however proved to be too dangerous as all the Element of Light did was to mutate the Darkness and in the process made the being not only a Denizen of Darkness but also stronger than most organisms.

sections.title: Meeting Blaid and Joining the Dark Empire

content.text: Genesis hid out with Angeal and Sephiroth at Villain's Vale prior to it being occupied by Dark Forces, Sephiroth led Blaid to their safe Haven after facing Blaid in a fight and learning of Blaid's connection as heir of the Dark Empire causing three powerful allies to aid the Traitor Keyblade Wielders, eventually they would follow after Blaid whom had formed the Dark Empire once again in the Realm In-Between.
Some of the Evil Villains of the Series.
Spyro is one of the many characters encountered by Sora in Kingdom Hearts II ½.

Spyro is a young, brave dragon from Dragon Shores. Somewhat headstrong and sarcastic, but also fearless. He is always accompanied by his best friend Sparx. They join forces with Sora on several occasions, fighting villains such as Gnasty Gnorc, Ripto and the Sorceress who are using the Heartless to plunge their worlds into darkness.

Spyro is capable of a wide array of physical and magical attacks, most of which are carried over from the original Spyro trilogy. His main attack, Fire Breath, is exactly what it sounds like - Spyro breathes fire which damages enemies. Charge involves Spyro running headfirst into enemies, ramming them with his horns. With Head Bash, Spyro jumps on top of an enemy, leaps into the air and slams down headfirst. Superflame is essentially a supercharged version of Fire Breath with greater attack power and a far greater range. A rarer attack is Ice Breath, which acts much like Blizzard magic, temporarily freezing enemies and damaging them as the ice cracks. Spyro's limit, Dragon Flight, has Sora ride on Spyro's back and fly across the arena. Spyro will spit Superflame fireballs, Sora will shoot bolts of Fire magic and hit nearby enemies with the Keyblade. The finish, Kamikaze, is a dive bomb into a pocket of enemies which causes an explosion and a shockwave.
If Sora is in the path of one of Spyro's fireballs, he can use the direction command Redirect to deflect it towards a nearby enemy.

content.text: Krystal McCloud is a member of the Star Fox team, and also the wife of the squadron leader, Fox McCloud.

Krystal was born on planet Cerinia, where her mother and father were killed during the planets destruction. She then joined Starfox, serving as a pilot and the teams' telepath. 2 years later after the events in Command, she married Fox McCloud and had one child, a son named Marcus.

After being rescued by Fox in Starfox Adventures, served as the team's telepath as seen in Starfox Assault when the squadron was battling in the Aparoid Wars. She was generally respected by the rest of the team, and even had a romantic relationship with Fox McCloud.

2 years after she married Fox, they moved to an unknown forest planet, a place where they hoped they would finally find peace. However, due to a surprise mission, they set a course for Corneria. Along they way, they stopped on another unknown planet to rest. Reminiscing their earlier days in the Star Fox team, Krystal began to worry about once again separating from Fox. Fox assured her, telling her that nothing would happen as long as they were together.

Asleep in her bed, Krystal experienced a vision of Andross's return in a dream she was having, disturbed by how real it seemed. She feared that this was indeed a sign of Andross's rebirth.  Not too long after, while Fox was away on Corneria to meet with Peppy Hare,  Krystal discovered she was pregnant with what was soon to be Marcus McCloud. Indeed however her vision came true, but somehow Andross had a clone body and possibly more, this triggered another Lylat war although strangely the former home base of Andross Venom had no sign of the Venomian Army or Andross at all, this started worrying Krystal awfully as she said to Peppy who now was the current General of the Cornarian Army that she has always knew that he would come back to haunt the Lylat system. Four weeks later on board the Great Fox, Andross made an ambush on the Star Fox team and brutally damaged the ship and attempted to lure Fox into his death but was not deceived by his foul actions, so he ordered the ship to hyperspace out of the trap and so they did but during the battle Andross said to Fox that he only wanted to take what was rightfully his, meaning Krystal and her unborn child, Fox had to hide her until he could find Andross and kill him and destroy the Venomian Army, so Fox sent Krystal to the planet Gev, an oasis with grassy plains and towering spires which she had been for a week until she was nearly kidnapped by a spy who threatens to kill her if she did not go to Andross but successfully had Fox arrive in time to rescue her from abduction. Fox knew that he was being spied on by a Cornarian agent who had information on Krystal's whereabouts, and told Andross so that he could get payed by him but immediately Fox knew that the agent was up to something and threatened to injure him so the agent told him about the plot to abduct Krystal so Fox reached to Gev and just when Krystal was brawling with the Venomian assassin who had a tranquilizer to knock her out but gets shot by Fox who immediately barges into her room and came to her aid and Fox told her that she was no longer safe there and they left the next day, but Fox knew he had to be with her at all times.

There are plenty of political parties on S3F (Try not to drink too much). However, there a some who cherish their independence and refuse to be pressured by party politics. These are the Mavericks. As the name implies, they are rebels who prefer to work on their their own.

Although you may be a Maverick, friends and support are still important. As a result, all the Mavericks listed here will help each other in order to achieve own common goal: to make the Geatest Star Fox Fan Fiction Ste Ever!!! In order to do this, we must follow the rules (but still take risks), to work together (but retain our individuality), and respect each others' work (but to provide useful criticism).
Remember: We don't accept any vows or obligations; we do what we do because we believe it's right.

Krystal and Fox attempt to hide from Andross' wrath as he employs notorious bounty hunters and mercenaries to bring them out of light in hiding. Fox will have to reorganize his team and find Andross and eliminate him once and for all.

Away From Boyfriends is a Star Fox fanfic by user Yamagata. It tells about how Krystal gets to know Katt Monroe, and eventually goes into a lesbian relationship with her.

Krystal meets with Katt on the Great Fox and spends a night of pleasure with the pink feline. The two then agree to go on a holiday to Corneria to meet with other girls and make love to them also. Krystal also has an encounter with an idiot Muppet named Beaker.

Krystal and Katt answer a call from the Molinari crime boss's wife Clarice and is told of the family's operations on Corneria. The mafia don, Alberto intercepts the message and is killed by the combined efforts of Krystal, Katt and Clarice. They do not know that Alberto had a son named Eric who immediately became the new don. Miyu and Fay, police officers of Corneria show up at Krystal's home with a picture of the Molinari top members. After the girls spend much time with other girls, Krystal and Katt finally decide to go to war with the Molinari family.

elements.text: 2007 Chevrolet Corvette C6-Prize for beating Jagged Rock Pass Mayhem Level 6
2008 Audi R8-You can get it off of Dolph Oberlander at the end of the game.
2005 Ford GT-Call up Angel De La Muerte as a homie and you can steal it off of him.
2009 Alfa Romeo Brera-Viola Dewynter is seen driving this in one mission.
2008 Maserati Quattroporte-Unlocked by beating Jagged Rock Pass Mayhem Level 3
2006 Jaguar XKR-Josh Birk is seen driving this in one mission.
2007 BMW Z4-Pierce is seen driving this when called up as a homie.
2010 Dodge Viper-This is parked outside the Saints hideout in Jagged Rock Pass still you will get a 3 star wanted level if you drive off in it.
2006 Porsche Carrera GT-Unlocked by beating Fuzz level 3 in Marten Island
2011 Nissan 370Z-You automatically get this after the mission Catching some Z's
2010 Alfa Romeo 8c Competezione-Beat Fuzz Level 6 on Marten Island
1994 Ford Escort Rs Cosworth-Shaundi drives this when called up as a homie.
2010 Lamborgini Gallardo LP 570-4 Superleggera-Complete 85% of the game.
2009 Chevrolet Corvette Grandsport-Buy it for $187,625 at Kris Deerkovsky's car dealership.
2003 Audi TT-But it for $52,429 at Kris Deerkovsky's car dealership
2008 Aston Martin DB9-Get it after defeating Tajiri Kanada in a time trial race on Eugene Island.
2006 Lamborghini Murcielago LP640-DLC[It is in your garage when the DLC is downloaded]
1969 Ford Mustang Boss 302-Mr.Wong can usually be seen driving this although on rare instances he will drive a 2007 Mercedes Benz SL65 AMG.
2005 Porsche Cayman S-parked in front of Donnie's garage on Eugene Island.
2011 Lamborghini Aventador-Ronnie Martinez owns a Purple aventador outside of his mansion at the start of the game.
2009 Mercedes Benz SLR Mclaren 722-Buy it from Kris Deerkovsky's car dealership for $664,200
1998 Mercedes CLK-GTR-Beat Tank Mayhem Level 3 in Downtown Freemason City. All the gangs in the game have a variant of this car.
2004 Ford Mustang-Beat Septic Avenger Level 3 on Mallacott Island.
2006 Dodge Ram SRT10-This is the car you drive in in the Mission We are No Saints.
2007 Mercedes Benz SL65 AMG-Mr.Wong rarely drives this.

content.text: The redneck mafia is a gang located in stillwater. Lead by Leo it is a gang of mostly white people although blacks russians and hispanics are also members.They came to the attention of the boss when the boss heard of a human trafficking ring being run out of stillwaters dock by the rednecks one of the people happened to be a friend of shaundis.The boss is introduced to an black man named Drake who was responsible for the human trafficking ring. The boss decides to destroy the rednecks human trafficking ring with the help of shaundi gat and tobias. However this angers Leo who has his number 2 vladimir destroy the saints hideout.however this fails and leo and two of his henchmen miguel and Dorian personally charge into bavogian plaza and start a gunfight with the saints however he and miguel are killed by a gunshot wound to the throat by pierce. The gang was named by his father.

Jimmy Wong is a 28 year old goth computer genius and the leader of the Kow Yun Lo Triad. He is described as the king of Money Laundering and rarely shows emotions when away from the computer. He drives a 2007 Chevrolet Corvette. He mainly deals in money laundering and has many bank accounts online. He is extremely brutal as he shot his own mother in the eye at the age of 14. He demands respect and loyalty from his followers and he will kill them if they show any hint of loyalty to the Saints. His older brother Donnie is also his mechanic and his most loyal follower. He also has an office located on the 2nd floor of Donnie's garage in Eugene Island. He also has an brief rivalry with his Uncle's sect of the triads [Mr.Wong explains that they never got along.]

sections.title: Missions in Saints Row Freemason Throwdown

elements.text: Like a Deerkovsky in a Headlight- The First mission involves you being introduced to Kris Deerkovski who is then kidnapped by Eugene Griffs and Carla Tompkins. He is then pushed in front of a bus driven by thew Tompkin siblings. It is your goal to Prevent him from dying by Somehow stopping the Train.
Catching Some Zs-After the first mission Kris Deerkovsky

content.text: Introduces you to the world of racing on Marten Island he has you race his friends and beat the Time limit of 5:20:00

elements.text: Tricks of the triad-Kinzie Kensington taps into the Triads websites and takes money out of their account and wires it to your account. You must protect her from Angry Triad thugs lead by Donnie.

Come get some-A wrestler who is revealed to be one of Dolph Oberlanders henchmen insults Angel De La muerte. Angel than asks the Player if he can enter Murderbrawl XXXII to shut him up.This mission is unlocked when you takeover 25% of Freemason City.

Ho Ho Ho-A pimp named Deve'reaux who is on the payroll of Tajiri Kaneda has stolen Zimos's Hos. He than stows away on Tajiri Kanedas boat the SS Bushwick. It is your goal to hunt him down and take the Hos to safety.
Freemason City are you ready?-After the 2nd mission Gat takes you on a tour of Freemason City. You then bump into an old friend Benjamin King.
Party Like its wait what year is it?-You crash a party orchestrated by Scottie Pippen and hold the partygoers hostage. This mission is vaugely similar to a scene in the show 24.
We are No Saints-You Angel and Oleg go and check out what Socttie Pippen has locked up in an abandoned theatre in Valehide Gardens.

content.text: The Vietnamese Mob is a gang led by two brothers Max Nguyen and Perry Nguyen. There buisnesses are Drug Trafficking Prostitution and Money Laundering. They live in a Mansion in Steelport. The mob was tasked with protecting Phillipe Loren's Prostitution ring. However the Saints having arrived in Steelport get into an altercation with one of their strongmen Jin Chi Minh[A vietnamese version of Victor rodriguez.] Max and Perry then personally try to destroy the Saints but are eventually gunned down by Oswaldo Rodriguez[A new saints member.] thus dissolving the Vietnamese mob.

Darryl Blake, Rap name D-1 Smoov, is a Killbane impersonator and rapper who is the target of the mission Killbane's revenge. In the mission he is revealed to have been responsible for the death of many saints. Shaundi calls the boss and tells him that Darryl has been impersonating Killbane going around and blowing up their property. During the mission you Angel and Johnny must go to an undisclosed warehouse however Colombian Cartel members are protecting him as it is revealed he gets his drugs from them. After you catch up to him he than drives away in his Mitsubishi Lancer Evo X he then crashes and tries to run away but is run over by a bus commandeered by the boss.

Shady Tree Bowling Alley is a Bowling Alley located on Marten Island. It is most prominently seen in mission 18 Opulence required where you have to steal back Zimos's hos which were kidnapped by Tajiri Kaneda. After the mission it could be bought by the Saints and you can play bowling here. However you are unable to play before Opulence required as the alley is guarded by Tajiri Kanedas thugs until the mission and they will turn you back and deflect your bullets with their swords. Also RPGs will not work as they will confiscate them and use them against you in the mission but only if you use one on them.

Carlton Beresford is one of Dolph Oberlanders henchmen and serves as the secondary antagonist of Saints Row Freemason Throwdown which takes place 7 months after Saints Row: The Third. He is an cold hearted british assassin who once worked for a band of british thugs. He is first seen spying on the 3rd Street Saints after the mission Catching Some Zs. He then later tries to kill Zimos but is knocked out by the Player Character. After that he guts a 3rd street saints member. Condsumed with Revenge The boss and Oleg catch him thus taking them to Downtown Freemason City. He tries to kill Oleg but he is pushed into a flaming car thus incinerating him. His charred corpse is later seen on the news. He is portrayed by Yuri Lowenthal.

Leo is a character in Saints Row Freemason throwdown. Leo is a huge fan of the 3rd street saints. he appears in the 24th mission Killbane's revenge where he helps take down Darryl Blake. He is from France and speaks with the same accent as Phillipe Loren. He wears a purple Muscle Shirt and Green pants with japanese geta thus showing his allegiance with the saints. He is also revealed to be an Avant Garde film director. He was voiced by Jacques Hennequet. He is first mentioned by Viola Dewynter at the Shady Tree Bowling Alley in mission 18 Opulence required. Leo's girlfriend is Julia Koslov who owns the Redneck drug lab.
A page containing all articles with the category "Games".
A page containing all Weapons fanon pages that have the category "Weapons" added to it.

We Are No Saints is the 5th mission in Saints Row Freemason City Throwdown. Viola calls you and explains that Scottie Pippen and his gang have some weapons stashed at an abandoned theatre in Valehide Gardens. Go into the Dodge Ram SRT10 and drive there. You than must kill the Goons which are protecting the Abandoned Theatre. Afterwards a Female goon with an Incinerator is blocking your way kill her anyway you want. You than are introduced to Euso Yun who is being given a blowjob by his Girlfriend Marisol. He then Aids you by telling you to go into the concession stand where the box is. It is then revealed that [[[RPG]]s and AR40s are in the box. Thankful for Euso's assistance he than recruits him into The Saints. Your Homies are Angel and Oleg.
Rewards-Respect,$5332,Euso Yun as a homie.

Prof.Malek is a guest character debuting in Saints Row Freemason City Throwdown. He hosts the show Prof.Maleks death defying breach of Reality. He is 41 years old. He was once a scientist working for the government but things went sour when the government threw him under the bus. He than decides to don a Zombie mask and hosted his own show. The player character participates in the show at the behest of Euso Yun. He is voiced by Skeet Ulrich.

The Steelport Yakuza are a gang in Steelport. They are usually found with AR-55 Gal43 and Vice 9 weapons. They are primarily japanese and are into the tuner scene although they dabble in prostitution and gunrunning. They are allied with the Third Street Saints and are usually hired muscle for the protagonist and Viola Dewynter who usually orders them to committ murder and drugs. They are lead by Dick Hiroshima and are as thuggish as the Saints. They also wear Black suits which are very well tailored. They also supply guns to the saints out of their hideout at Henry Steel Mills. Their favorite music stations are 95.4 Krhyme FM and 107.64 Heavy Metal FM.

Carla and Kevin Tompkins are two hired thugs that Dolph Oberlander hired in his war on the Saints. Kevin is the oldest of the two and graduated from Harvard along with his younger sister. And instead of entering legit buisness ventures they worked for Dolph. Dolph liked the two americans and they became his criminal students. They also owe a Recording Studio where they record music and carry out their drug trafficking duties in secret as well as being Dolph's financial advisors. They have increased Dolph's profits by a substantial amount. They invite the Boss ,Angel De La Muerte,Shaundi and Pierce to Dolphs private yacht. They are also acquainted with Kris Deerkovsky havng brazenly extorted money from him. Kris also used to be their friend but due to their extortion he threw them under the bus which caused them to kidnap him. In fact the first mission in Saints Row Freemason throwdown involves rescuing him from being killed by a speeding train commandered by the two siblings. Kevin is portrayed by Rory Culkin while Carla is portrayed by Emma Roberts.

Ronnie Martinez and his brother Rico Martinez own a gentlemans club in Downtown Freemason City. Rico is glad to see the boss has survived the boat explosion which put him into a coma. He then explains that the cops have been trying to shake his younger brother down and has Marcel along with Pierce cause some trouble. He and his brother are unlocked as homies if you complete the game 100%

The Ameiru Syndicate are a shady crime syndicate lead by Scott Pippen and are engaged in drug trafficking,computer hacking and human trafficking. They are not well known as they are usually quiet. However this all changes when the saints arrive in Freemason City. Calling for a meeting with the saints in Poison Holly Stadium,he reveals himself as the one responsible for the saints problems in Freemason City. This makes the saints leader angry. And so they wage a bloody campaign of violence against the Ameiru Syndicate that ends with the near death of Johnny Gat due to him being poisoned with a venom. However Gat lives to aid in bringing down the Ameiru Corporation. They are usually seen with K-8 Krukovs,Mini-Guns,Gal43 and AR200 Saws and KA-1 Kobras,They also have stun guns as their weapons. They are the first all black gang in Freemason City's history

sections.title: Party Like its wait what year is it?

content.text: Party like its wait what year is it is the 6th mission in Saints Row Freemason City Throwdown. Your goal is to go to the Amierus Penthouse and kidnap and kill the hostages who are close personal friends of the Amieru Syndicate. Your homies for this mission are Viola DeWynter and Euso Yun.

elements.text: The mission is similar to the hostage situation in an episde of the show 24.
Players cannot kill the Amieru Syndicate goons with their barehands because they will always reverse your attacks.
One of the Amieru goons mentions Joseph Price.

content.text: $6,800,Respect,Amieru Penthouse as a crib.

Tajiri Kanada is a japanese man who leads the Freemason City Yakuza.He is a character in Saints Row:Freemason Throwdown. After being banished to japan for killing a guy in the wrestling ring he decides to return to Freemason City to lead his crew into a war with The Saints. He is the japanese equivalent to the General being polite to all even those he considers his enemy. At one point in time he was the tag partner to Yasshi Sanban and together they took away the tag team champions from the Smolder Brothers. He became consumed with hatred for his partner after he stole his girlfriend and decided to have him personally killed which he did by planting a car bomb underneath his car. He lives in a house on Myrtle ave.

content.text: Black Yoshi is one of the main characters in SuperMarioLogan. He is a portrayed as a black-equivalent of Yoshies with many stereotypes of African-Americans, most notably his accent. He lives in the same house as Mario. He is known for his obsession of Call of Duty, (up to the point of charging up Mario's credit card bill), his treasured gun, (which is an NES Zapper), and his long criminal record of murder. Despite this he can be soft-hearted on some occassions towards his friends including Mario, Red, Tyrone Calvin and a host of others. He is played by Logan.
